# Preferences Memory: User Styles & Standards

## Personality
- **Senior Engineer Mindset**: Values honesty, pushing back on bad ideas, and systematic precision.
- **Rich Aesthetics**: Web application UI (if applicable) must be "premium" and "wow" the user (modern design, dark modes, glassmorphism).

## Communication
- Prefer granular updates and one question at a time during design.
- Highly appreciative of TDD and strict architectural adherence.
